Class GoogleCalendar::ServiceBase
In: lib/googlecalendar/service_base.rb

Public Instance methods

delete(feed, event)

delete an event.

[Source]

     # File lib/googlecalendar/service_base.rb, line 95
 95:     def delete(feed, event)
 96:       logger.info("-- delete st --") if logger
 97:       auth unless @auth
 98:       uri = URI.parse(feed)
 99:       res = do_post(uri, 
100:               {"X-HTTP-Method-Override" => "DELETE", 
101:                "Content-Type" => "application/atom+xml",
102:                "Content-Length" => event.length.to_s}, event)
103:       logger.info("-- delete en (#{res.message}) --") if logger
104:       res
105:     end

query(cal_url, conditions = nil)

send query for events of a calendar and returns http response object. available condtions are

  • :q => query string
  • :max-results => max contents count. (default: 25)
  • :start-index => 1-based index of the first result to be retrieved
  • :orderby => the order of retrieved data.
  • :published-min => Bounds on the entry publication date(oldest)
  • :published-max => Bounds on the entry publication date(newest)
  • :updated-min => Bounds on the entry update date(oldest)
  • :updated-max => Bounds on the entry update date(newest)
  • :author => Entry author

and so on. For detail, see code.google.com/apis/gdata/protocol.html#Queries 

            and http://code.google.com/apis/calendar/reference.html#Parameters

[Source]

    # File lib/googlecalendar/service_base.rb, line 80
80:     def query(cal_url, conditions = nil)
81:       logger.info("-- query st --") if logger
82:       auth unless @auth
83:       uri = URI.parse(cal_url)
84:       uri.query = conditions.map do |key, val|
85:         "#{key}=#{URI.escape(val.kind_of?(Time) ? val.getutc.iso8601 : val.to_s)}"
86:       end.join("&") unless conditions.nil?
87:       res = do_get(uri, {})
88:       logger.info("-- query en (#{res.message}) --") if logger
89:       res
90:     end
update(feed, event)

update an event.

[Source]

     # File lib/googlecalendar/service_base.rb, line 124
124:     def update(feed, event)
125:       logger.info("-- update st --") if logger
126:       auth unless @auth
127:       uri = URI.parse(feed)
128:       res = do_post(uri, 
129:               {"X-HTTP-Method-Override" => "PUT", 
130:                "Content-Type" => "application/atom+xml",
131:                "Content-Length" => event.length.to_s}, event)
132:       logger.info("-- update en (#{res.message}) --") if logger
133:       res
134:     end

do_get(uri, header)

[Source]

     # File lib/googlecalendar/service_base.rb, line 153
153:     def do_get(uri, header)
154:       logger.debug("GET:" + uri.to_s) if logger
155:       res = nil
156:       try_http(uri, header) do |http,path,head| 
157:         res = http.get(path, head) 
158:       end
159:       res
160:     end
do_post(uri, header, content)

[Source]

     # File lib/googlecalendar/service_base.rb, line 143
143:     def do_post(uri, header, content)
144:       logger.debug("POST:" + uri.to_s) if logger
145:       res = nil
146:       try_http(uri, header, content) do |http,path,head,args|
147:         cont = args[0]
148:         res = http.post(path, cont, head) 
149:       end
150:       res
151:     end
path_with_authorized_query(uri)

[Source]

     # File lib/googlecalendar/service_base.rb, line 191
191:     def path_with_authorized_query(uri)
192:       query = CGI.parse(uri.query.nil? ? "" : uri.query)
193:       query["gsessionid"] = [@session] if @session
194:       qs = query.map do |k,v| "#{CGI.escape(k)}=#{CGI.escape(v[0])}" end.join("&")
195:       qs.empty? ? uri.path : "#{uri.path}?#{qs}"
196:     end
try_http(uri, header, *args) {|http, path_with_authorized_query(uri, header, args)| ...}

[Source]

     # File lib/googlecalendar/service_base.rb, line 162
162:     def try_http(uri, header, *args)
163:       res = nil
164:       add_authorize_header(header)
165:       Net::HTTP.start(uri.host, uri.port, @@proxy_addr, @@proxy_port, @@proxy_user, @@proxy_pass) do |http|
166:         header["Cookie"] = @cookie if @cookie
167:         res = yield(http, path_with_authorized_query(uri), header, args)
168:         logger.debug(res) if logger
169:         if res.code == "302"
170:           ck = sess = nil
171:           ck = res["set-cookie"] if res.key?("set-cookie")
172:           uri = URI.parse(res["location"]) if res.key?("location")
173:           if uri && uri.query
174:             qr = CGI.parse(uri.query)
175:             sess = qr["gsessionid"][0] if qr.key?("gsessionid")
176:           end
177:           if ck && sess
178:             logger.debug("cookie: #{ck}, gsessionid:#{sess}") if logger
179:             header["Cookie"] = @cookie = ck
180:             @session = sess
181:             res = yield(http, path_with_authorized_query(uri), header, args)
182:             logger.debug(res) if logger
183:           else
184:             logger.fatal res.body.gsub(/\n/, ' ') if logger
185:           end
186:         end
187:       end
188:       res
189:     end

[Validate]
